page.title: 05New Deer Gala
page.content: { New Deer Gala}is a{week-long programme of{sports ,entertainments {competitions and sales,}held, by tradition, in the{second week of June each year. The purpose of the Gala is to provide{entertainment (mostly by {local people)}for the villagers and visitors at the same time as{raising {money}to help with the upkeep of the village hall and pleasure park. The following selection of events is typical:{sheepdog trials,talent {contest,5-a-side football,races, {wrestling,bowling,croquet, sale of {work,side shows and concerts. The Gala Convener has one of the most difficult offices on the Community Association management committee.
